Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Ashland/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Ashland/Lake. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
